alert.note: Alert for Knox; Marshall; McLean; Peoria; Stark; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued July 27 at 3:06AM CDT until July 28 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with heat index values up to 115 expected, with overnight heat index values only falling into the mid to upper 70s. * WHERE...Knox, Stark, Peoria, Marshall, Woodford, Tazewell and McLean Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 8 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat and humidity will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities. The impacts of heat are cumulative, and are amplified with extended exposure.
info.instruction: Respect the heat. Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air- conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Knox; Marshall; McLean; Peoria; Stark; Tazewell; Woodford
